Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec ET Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae Amplified DNA Assays
Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Viper System and BD ProbeTec ET Amplified DNA Assays for qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in clinical specimens using SDA and ET technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in endocervical swabs, male urethral swabs, and urine specimens from symptomatic or asymptomatic males and females, as evidence of infection, using strand displacement amplification.
